channel.title: Minor Prophet on ✟ Christian Writings ✟
channel.description: Recent content in Minor Prophet on ✟ Christian Writings ✟

item.title: Book Of Hosea
item.description: Book Of Hosea Book of Hosea, also spelled Osee, the first of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , considered as one book, The Twelve, in the Jewish canon.

item.title: Book Of Joel
item.description: Book Of Joel Book of Joel, second of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets .

item.title: Book Of Amos
item.description: Book Of Amos Book of Amos, the third of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , collected in one book under the Jewish canon titled The Twelve.

item.title: Book Of Obadiah
item.description: Book Of Obadiah Book of Obadiah, also spelled Abdias, the fourth of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , in the Jewish canon treated as one book, The Twelve.

item.title: Book Of Jonah
item.description: Book Of Jonah Book of Jonah, also spelled Jonas, the fifth of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , embraced in a single book, The Twelve, in the Jewish canon.

item.title: Book Of Micah
item.description: Book Of Micah Book of Micah, the sixth of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , grouped together as The Twelve in the Jewish canon.

item.title: Book Of Nahum
item.description: Book Of Nahum Book of Nahum, the seventh of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets (grouped together as The Twelve in the Jewish canon).

item.title: Book Of Habakkuk
item.description: Book Of Habakkuk The Book of Habakkuk, also called The Prophecy Of Habacuc, the eighth of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets .

item.title: Book Of Zephaniah
item.description: Book Of Zephaniah Book of Zephaniah, also called Sophonias, the ninth of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , collected in one book, The Twelve, in the Jewish canon.

item.title: Book Of Haggai
item.description: Book Of Haggai The Book of Haggai, also called The Prophecy Of Aggeus, the 10th of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets .

item.title: Book Of Zechariah
item.description: Book Of Zechariah Book of Zechariah, also spelled Zacharias, the 11th of 12 Old Testament books that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , collected in the Jewish canon in one book, The Twelve.

item.title: Book Of Malachi
item.description: Book Of Malachi The Book of Malachi, also called The Prophecy of Malachias, the last of 12 books of the Hebrew Bible (Old Testament ) that bear the names of the Minor Prophets , grouped together as the Twelve in the Jewish canon.
